info.task: navigate forwards to a paragraph inside a contentinfo landmark
info.title: Navigate forwards to a paragraph inside a contentinfo landmark in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusBeforeContentinfo
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link before the contentinfo landmark
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link before the contentinfo landmark
testPageDocument.getElementById('beforelink').focus();

user: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the paragraph inside the contentinfo landmark.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the paragraph inside the contentinfo landmark.
instructions.mode: Verify the Virtual Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn on the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: Text 'W3C ARIA Authoring Practices Task Force' is conveyed
